I feel like: Why spend $4bn on anything\, just to dismantle it?  kk's strategy(?) makes no sense and\, as a result\, the brand equity is disappearing.\nThe entire mythos\, characters\, and\, even more recent plot lines are all destroyed by this movie - which is so bad\, the ill will from ex-SW fans is bleeding into Disney.
